column2: ggplot(data=df_neighbourhood.mitte.light ,aes(x=date,y=total_offers,colour=neighbourhood))+theme_fivethirtyeight()+ geom_line(,size=1)+labs(colour="")+ theme(axis.title = element_text(),axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1),legend.text=element_text(size=10),plot.caption=element_text(size=8))+scale_x_date(breaks = pretty_breaks(15))+ ggtitle("Mitte : Full appartments")+labs(caption = "©Clément Lefèvre 2017 (Sources : insideairbnb.com)")+ylab("online offers")+scale_colour_manual(values = palette)
